page.title: 08HOUSEWORK AIDS:NORTH NORFOLK
page.content: Some people prefer to renovate an old cottage or house, as a holiday home. These are usually sited in the villages close to permanent residences. There are sites near the sea, for tents, and one large site near Eccles, caters for all types - Chalets, caravans, bungalows - even converted Railway carrages! {NORTH NORFOLK HOUSEWORK AIDS The responsibility for cleaning the family home still falls mainly on the woman. Due to scientific and technological advances there are now many electrically powered labour saving devices availabe to make life easier for the housewife. Vacuum cleaners are widely used for cleaning floors and furnishings. {
